# lib_cmakelists.mustache
# Auto-generated by forge.py

add_library(bdd-runner_lib
    src/bdd-runner.cpp
)

target_include_directories(bdd-runner_lib PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)

set_target_properties(bdd-runner_lib PROPERTIES
    RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin
)
